casebody.data:
Travis E. SHORT v. YOUNG, SCANLON, AND SESSUMS, P.A., A Mississippi Corporation, Pat H. Scanlon, Individually and as an Officer in the firm of Young, Scanlon & Sessums, P.A. No. 57846. Supreme Court of Mississippi. Aug. 17, 1988. Travis E. Short, Pascagoula, pro se. Lawrence J. Franck, Kenneth W. Barton, Butler, Snow, O’Mara, Stevens & Cannada, Jackson, for appellee.

Before HAWKINS, P.J., and ANDERSON and GRIFFIN, JJ. AFFIRMED.
